quote: Stay hard!
author: David Goggins

quote: The only thing that's keeping you from getting what you want is the story you keep telling yourself.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: If you’re tired of starting over, stop giving up.
author: Unknown

quote: If you want to be the best, you have to do things that other people aren’t willing to do.
author: Michael Phelps

quote: Most people give up not because they can’t do it, but because they’re unwilling to work for it.
author: David Goggins

quote: Discipline equals freedom.
author: Jocko Willink

quote: You have to believe in yourself when no one else does – that makes you a winner right there.
author: Venus Williams

quote: Today I will do what others won’t, so tomorrow I can do what others can’t.
author: Jerry Rice

quote: Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Don’t count the days, make the days count.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: You must expect great things of yourself before you can do them.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: The human body is the best picture of the human soul.
author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

quote: No matter how hard you work, someone else is working harder.
author: Elon Musk

quote: The pain you feel today will be the strength you feel tomorrow.
author: Unknown

quote: Push yourself, because no one else is going to do it for you.
author: Unknown

quote: Embrace the pain. It’s the pathway to greatness.
author: Unknown

quote: Every day is a new chance to show the world your relentless pursuit of excellence.
author: Unknown

quote: When you think you’re done, you’re only 40% done. Keep going.
author: David Goggins

quote: Comfort is a slow death; prefer the pain of growth.
author: Navy SEAL saying

quote: Don’t negotiate with weakness. Conquer it.
author: Jocko Willink

quote: Champions aren’t made in gyms. They’re made from something they have deep inside them—a desire, a dream, a vision.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: It’s not about how bad you want it. It’s about how hard you’re willing to work for it.
author: Unknown

quote: I’m not training to be good at something. I’m training to be unbreakable.
author: David Goggins

quote: Excuses are the lies you tell yourself to avoid taking responsibility.
author: Jocko Willink

quote: You won’t always be motivated; you have to learn to be disciplined.
author: Unknown

quote: Don’t stop when you’re tired. Stop when you’re done.
author: Unknown

quote: Turn your setbacks into your comeback story.
author: Unknown

quote: Hustle in silence and let your results make the noise.
author: Unknown

quote: You didn’t come this far only to come this far.
author: Unknown

quote: Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Weakness is a choice, and so is strength. Choose wisely.
author: Unknown

quote: I don’t stop when I’m tired, I stop when I’m done.
author: Unknown

quote: Your mind will quit a thousand times before your body does. Feel the pain and do it anyway.
author: Unknown

quote: If it doesn’t challenge you, it won’t change you.
author: Fred DeVito

quote: Success isn’t owned. It’s leased, and rent is due every day.
author: J.J. Watt
